summary: A man accepts a challenge by the chief minister of Maharashtra to run the state for one day, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.
cast: Anil Kapoor|Rani Mukerji|Amrish Puri|Johnny Lever|Pooja Batra|Sushmita Sen|Mukesh Ahuja|Babu Antony|Rana Jung Bahadur|Neha Bam|Ravindra Berde|Ekta Jain|Chandramani Jangde|Kanal Kannan|Khyaati Khandke Keswani|Razak Khan|Raja Krishnamoorthy|Neena Kulkarni|Hemant Mishra|Omakuchi Narasimhan|Bachan Pachehra|Janardhan Parab|Anup J. Patel|Ponnambalam|Laxmi Ratan|Paresh Rawal|Shivaaji Satam|Mahinder Shera|Saurabh Shukla|Anupam Shyam|Sanjeev Siddharth|Indal Singh|Mukesh Trivedi|Sudhir Waghmare|Raj Acharya
title: Nayak: The Real Hero
